item.title: Code not working
item.dc:creator: @steelrends steelrends
item.description:
@steelrends wrote:

else if(objectID == 5282) { if(playerHasItemAmount(618, 5)==true) { deleteItem(618, GetItemSlot(618), 5); addItem(3459, 5); sendMessage("You worship the Ectofuntus and teleport back."); } if(playerHasItemAmount(618, 5)==false) { sendMessage("You need to have 5 bone beads to worship. "); } }
I’m trying to make it so if you have 5 bone beads in your inventory it will give you a key and delete the 5 bone beads (I’m putting in the teleporting later). But it doesn’t seem to be working, it only works for stack-able items like coins. I don’t want to make the item stack-able because it would be too easy.

Read full topic
